snippet: Justice Minister José Eduardo Cardozo said that Brazil would grant visas to thousands of Haitians who have arrived recently in remote areas of the Amazon seeking work.
abstract: Brazilian Justice Min Jose Eduardo Cardozo says country will grant visas to thousands of Haitians who have arrived in remote areas of the Amazon seeking work; adds that country will also step up policing of borders where Haitians are crossing over.
lead_paragraph: Justice Minister José Eduardo Cardozo said that Brazil would grant visas to thousands of Haitians who have arrived recently in remote areas of the Amazon seeking work.

headline.main: Brazil to Grant Work Visas to Haitians
headline.print_headline: Brazil to Grant Work Visas to Haitians
